entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
